sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCol, CFormGroup, CInput, CLabel, CRow} from "@coreui/react";
import CIcon from "@coreui/icons-react";

class ProductForm extends React.Component {

  state = {
    product: {
      supplierId: "",
      productCategory: "",
      productType: "",
      productName: "",
      productDescription: "",
      productQuantity: "",
      productCostPrice: "",
      productSellingPrice: "",
      productDiscountAmount: "",
      productDiscountPercentage: ""
    }
  }

  handleFormSubmit = (e) => {

    alert("form submit i called")


  }


  render() {
    return (

      <CRow>

        <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
          <CCard>
            <CCardBody>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="supplierId">Supplier</CLabel>
                <CInput id="supplierId" name="supplierId" value={this.state.product.supplierId} placeholder="Enter your company name"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Category</CLabel>
                <CInput name="productCategory"  id="productCategory" value={this.state.product.productCategory} placeholder="Enter Product Category"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="productCategory">Product Type</CLabel>
                <CInput name="productType" id="productType" value={this.state.product.productType}  placeholder="Enter Product Type"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup row className="my-0">
                <CCol xs="8">
                  <CFormGroup>
                    <CLabel htmlFor="productName">Product Name</CLabel>
                    <CInput name="productName" id="productName" value={this.state.product.productName} placeholder="Enter Product Name"/>
                  </CFormGroup>
                </CCol>
                <CCol xs="4">
                  <CFormGroup>
                    <CLabel htmlFor="productDescription">Product Description</CLabel>
                    <CInput name="productDescription" id="productDescription" value={this.state.product.productDescription} placeholder="Enter Product Description"/>
                  </CFormGroup>
                </CCol>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="quantity">Quantity</CLabel>
                <CInput id="quantity" name="productQuantity" value={this.state.product.productQuantity} placeholder="Quantity"/>
              </CFormGroup>
            </CCardBody>

          </CCard>
        </CCol>

        <CCol xs="12" sm="6">
          <CCard>
            <CCardBody>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="costPrice">Cost Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                <CInput id="costPrice" name="costPrice" placeholder="Enter your Cost Price"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="sellingPrice">Selling Price(Rs.)</CLabel>
                <CInput id="costPrice" name="costPrice" placeholder="Enter Selling Price"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountAmount">Discount Amount</CLabel>
                <CInput id="productDiscountAmount" name="productDiscountAmount" placeholder="Enter Discount Amount"/>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup row className="my-0">
                <CCol xs="8">
                  <CFormGroup>
                    <CLabel htmlFor="productDiscountPercentage">Dicount Percentage(%)</CLabel>
                    <CInput id="productDiscountPercentage" name="productDiscountPercentage" placeholder="Enter your city"/>
                  </CFormGroup>
                </CCol>
                <CCol xs="4">
                  <CFormGroup>
                    <CLabel htmlFor="postal-code">Postal Code</CLabel>
                    <CInput id="postal-code" placeholder="Postal Code"/>
                  </CFormGroup>
                </CCol>
              </CFormGroup>
              <CFormGroup>
                <CLabel htmlFor="country">Country</CLabel>
                <CInput id="country" placeholder="Country name"/>
              </CFormGroup>
            </CCardBody>
            <CCardFooter>
              <CButton type="submit" onClick={this.handleFormSubmit} size="sm" color="primary"><CIcon
                name="cil-scrubber"/> Submit</CButton>
              <CButton type="reset" size="sm" color="danger"><CIcon name="cil-ban"/> Reset</CButton>
            </CCardFooter>

          </CCard>
        </CCol>

      </CRow>


    )
  }
}

export default ProductForm
